00049 
00050 typedef struct {
00051   long offset;
00052   uint size;
00053   double time;
00054 }IPX_frame;
00055 
00056 /* Status data for ipx read/write */
00057 typedef struct {
00058   FILE *fd;          /* Open file descriptor */
00059   IPX_header header; /* IPX file header */
00060   IPX_frame *frames; /* List of frames */
00061 }IPX_status;
